lead_paragraph: What pop music rivalries reveal about our lives, and some celebrated musicians’ most treasured songs.

headline.main: ‘Your Favorite Band Is Killing Me’ and ‘Your Song Changed My Life’

snippet: What pop music rivalries reveal about our lives, and some celebrated musicians’ most treasured songs.
abstract: Alan Light reviews books Your Favorite Band Is Killing Me: What Pop Music Rivalries Reveal About the Meaning of Life by Steven Hyden and Your Song Changed My Life: From Jimmy Page to St Vincent, Smokey Robinson to Hozier, Thirty-Five Beloved Artists on Their Journey and the Music That Inspired It by Bob Boilen.
